pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Random filters: Python packaging for generate random filters to use in your project## Installation```bashpip install random-filters```## Usage```pythonimport random_filters as rf# checkboxrf.checkbox()# comboboxrf.combobox_hierarchy({"Estado": ["SP", "SP", "SP", "SC", "SC", "SC"], "Cidade": ["São Paulo", "Itatiba", "Campinas", "Chapecó", "Xaxim", "Xanxerê"]})# daterf.date('2019-01-01', '2019-12-31')# date_partitionrf.date_partition(2)# storerf.store(2)```## ContributingPull requests are welcome. For major changes, please open an issue first to discuss what you would like to change.
